entry.title: Shiver Entertainment
entry.subtitle: Unreal Engine Optimization Specialists
entry.description: Used as a trusted contractor by several AAA studios, Shiver Entertainment is one of the foremost experts in optimizing Unreal Engine software to run on lower powered systems (particularly the Nintendo Switch). Despite having been acquired by Embracer Group by way of Saber Interactive, Shiver is perhaps most commonly known for their close working relationship with Warner Brothers Games and subsidiaries, with several major titles having their Switch ports done by Shiver.

entry.title: Virtel
entry.subtitle: Virtual Reality Language Learning
entry.description: Virtel was a small team working to create software for foreign language education in Virtual Reality. Although now defunct, the team was at one point poised to publish an initial package of Latin American Spanish learning environments and activities.

entry.title: Distraction Break
entry.subtitle: Time Management through Interruption
entry.description: Distract break is a simple extension that allows you to build a list of distracting sites and configure a limiting timer. The app differentiates between time spent on productive sites and time spent on blacklisted ones, and increments the timer when more time is spent unproductively.

entry.title: Capstone Project
entry.subtitle: Self Aligning Free Space Optics
entry.description: My Capstone project team was contracted by Raytheon to design and develop a system that would allow for easy self-alignment of a Free Space Optics (FSO) systems. By using Computer Vision and an Arduino micro controller we were able to create a system that could identify and pivot towards a target at distances of up to one Kilometer.

entry.title: Food Wheel
entry.subtitle: For when your Friends are Unhelpful
entry.description: This is a really simple page that uses your location data to pull a list of local restaurants and select one at random. There is a bit of customization if you want to limit some options, but it's very rudimentary. Perfect when nobody will agree on anything, because it will easily prove that your group can agree on what everybody DOESN'T want.
